parameter.name: customerId
parameter.description: The identifier of the customer to whom create the subscription

parameter.name: plan
parameter.description: The identifier of the plan to subscribe the customer to

parameter.name: trialEnd
parameter.description: Unix timestamp representing the end of the trial period the customer will get before being charged for the first time

parameter.name: coupon
parameter.description: Discount amount to be applied to all recurring charges

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity you’d like to apply to the subscription you’re creating

parameter.name: applicationFeePercent
parameter.description: Percentage of the subscription invoice subtotal

parameter.name: taxPercent
parameter.description: Percentage of the subscription invoice subtotal that will be added as tax to the final amount each billing period

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: A set of key/value pairs that you can attach to a subscription object.

parameter.name: cardNumber
parameter.description: The card number, as a string without any separators
